articles.title: Moderna Chief Medical Officer Confirms mRNA Injection For COVID-19 Can Change Your Genetic Code.
articles.teaser: From a TEDx Beacon Street talk occurred in 2017, Tal Zaks, chief medical officer of Moderna, Inc., one pharmaceutical company manufacturer of the experimental mRNA technology injection, confirms mRNA injection for COVID-19 can change your genetic code or DNA.

articles.title: Amateur Rocket-Maker Finally Launches Himself Off Earth - Now To Prove It's Flat
articles.teaser: Several police vehicles surrounded Pawlowski after he finished a service on Saturday, ordered him out of his car and made him kneel down on a busy highway to arrest him.

articles.title: The Covid-19 Vaccine Will Contain A Microchip
articles.teaser: Despite the majority of us keeping our fingers crossed for a Covid-19 vaccine to be developed as soon as possible, others on the internet are sceptical about the benefits of a such a cure.

articles.title: Amateur Rocket-Maker Finally Launches Himself Off Earth - Now To Prove It's Flat
articles.teaser: Mike Hughes, a California man who is most known for his belief that the Earth is shaped like a Frisbee, finally blasted off into the sky in a steam-powered rocket he had built himself.

articles.title: New Year 2020: 10 Moments This Decade That Made Us Say, "Wait, What?"
articles.teaser: Happy New Year 2020: This list of ten moments includes not just personalities in India and across the world, but also certain events which have had a number of consequences for those involved.

articles.title: ‘It is a trap!’: Inside the QAnon attack that never happened
articles.teaser: Why fears of violence on March 4, the mythical day Trump was supposed to be inaugurated to a second term, proved unfounded.

articles.title: New Vaccine Conspiracy Theories Are Going Viral in Arabic
articles.teaser: Facebook has been criticized for failing to curb misinformation in English. But little attention has been paid to the scale of the problem in Arabic.
